subject: RE: [junit] assert keywork
msgSnippet: You must enable assertions. Under window/preferences/java/installed JREs, edit the JRE, and set the vmargs to -ea Benedict ... Outgoing mail is certified Virus
messageBody:
You must enable assertions.
Under window/preferences/java/installed JREs, edit the JRE, and set the
vmargs to -ea

Benedict


> -----Original Message-----
> From: albamatiit [mailto:albamatiit@...]
> Sent: 08 November 2004 13:49

> Subject: [junit] assert keywork

> I use JUnit in Eclipse 3.0. When an assert (java keyword) fail, the

> assert failure in tests?
> Bye
